ledSettings.hlpTxt: Click here for help on this page
ledSettings.powSetBeTxt: Set the behavior of the Power Indicator LED.
ledSettings.normalPowTxt: Normal - The LED shows green for normal operation.
ledSettings.offPowTxt: Off - The LED is off during normal operation.
ledSettings.netwSetBeTxt: Set the behavior of the Network Indicator LED.
ledSettings.netwEnableTxt: Enabled - The LED is enabled and flashes when there is network traffic.
ledSettings.netwDisableTxt: Disabled - The LED is disabled and is not lit.
ledSettings.setBeTxt: Set the behavior of the Status Indicator LED.
ledSettings.normalStatTxt: Normal - The LED shows green for normal operation.
ledSettings.offStatTxt: Off - The LED is off during normal operation.
